reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, not itchy, and true to size, with one noting it leaves room to move. The dress is flattering on the body, particularly for plus-size figures, and one customer mentions it creates the illusion of a waistline. They appreciate its appearance, with one noting it appears more expensive than it is, and its sparkle that's not overly shimmering. The material thickness receives mixed feedback, with several customers finding it too thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, Comfortable & Sparkly — I Loved It So Much This Is My Third Color!
items.body: This dress is such a winner! I have it in three colors now because the fit and style are just that good. The cut is super flattering and the fabric has plenty of stretch, so it’s very comfortable to wear all day. It also has this gorgeous shiny, sparkly finish that makes it perfect for fall events, holidays, or even a casual night out. One of my favorite features is the little snap at the chest, you can keep it closed for extra coverage or leave it open depending on the look you want. Such a thoughtful detail! The only thing to note is that it does need to be steamed when it first arrives, but once you do that, it looks beautiful and flowy. Overall, I absolutely love this dress and keep reaching for it. Comfortable, cute, and just the right amount of sparkle! Read more
items.author: The Curvy Darlin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: Fits fantastic. Nice material, needs a bit of ironing, but overall it looks great. Ordered a size 14 plus, im 5'7, 240lbs with a pear body shape. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars FANTASTIC Purchase!
items.body: All I can say is BUY THE DRESS! I have used it for a vintage themed party, a Christmas party and now I will be wearing it to a work anniversary party for my husband. The material is very soft and THICK. It has a slight sheen to the material making it appear much more expensive and slightly upping the dressy quality. VERY flattering cut. I am 5’4” 197lbs and I bought XXL. And, IT HAD POCKETS! Read more
items.author: TxTravelgirl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good dress for the price!
items.body: I ordered this dress last minute for a Halloween costume after another dress disappointed me. I LOVED it! I got so many compliments on this dress. The sizing was accurate and fit me perfectly. The cut out in the front was very appealing, if you know what I mean. The coloring was accurate. The sparkle is not as intense as the picture but is still lovely and a nice touch of femininity. The flow is perfect compared to the fitted top and creates a good contrast. I thought it was very flattering on my body type as a plus sized woman. My only complaint would be that the material was rather itchy and not of a perfect quality. It was worth it for how sparkly it was though. I got used to it after wearing it for a bit and did not mind because I liked the dress so much. It did come wrinkled but it seems tricky to avoid that. I can see myself re-wearing this for events in the future. 100% worth the price. Read more
items.author: Julia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The dress has some stretch and fit perfectly
items.body: The dress fit me perfectly, I bought this dress for my husband's work Christmas party. I received alot of compliments, but the dress felt good and was very comfortable, I would like to buy the red one as well. Read more
items.author: Barnes

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Purchase with caution.
items.body: Honestly, it was completely see through. I needed it for a wedding I was attending, and I could not wear it due to it being see through and definitely not flattering at all. The picture on the screen was very different from the dress, that I received. Read more
items.author: Vicki Felps

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as fancy as it looks
items.body: Pretty dress. Fits like I expected. It's thinner than expected but still nice. Only issue is it does not look quite like the pictures. It's not as fancy. I bought it for a Gala and it's more like a regular date night dress. Will be returning. Read more
items.author: E

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVED IT
items.body: I wore this to girls only party made me feel so sexy!!! I still have the pics I took saved in my phone and good quality that I can still wear today!! Read more
items.author: Ayana Anderson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Brown2, Hot Pink, Black, Blue2, Navy Blue, Orange, Dark Green, Red, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
